this_title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe Season 1
trans_title: 未解之谜：宇宙之谜 第一季
introduction: Host and Executive Producer William Shatner explores our earth, and beyond, in search of the universe’s most fascinating, strange and inexplicable mysteries.Each episode features contributions from scientists, historians, astronauts and other experts—each seeking to shed light on how the seemingly impossible actually can happen. Seeking answers to age-old questions that have mystified mankind for centuries. Things like, how was our earth born? Will we go back to the moon—or venture even farther? What dangers might lurk in the deep expanse of outer space? And perhaps the biggest of all—are we alone?S1 E1 Are We Alone?S1 E2 Alien EarthlingsS1 E3 Mysterious EarthS1 E4 Venus: Earth's Evil TwinS1 E5 Dangers From Space
chinese_title: 未解之谜：宇宙之谜 第一季
foreign_title: The UnXplained: Mysteries of the Universe Season 1
